mapper.select: SELECT PORT_YR AS port_yr ,FRST_RGTR AS frst_rgtr ,FRST_REG_DT AS frst_reg_dt ,LAST_MDFR AS last_mdfr ,LAST_MDFCN_DT AS last_mdfcn_dt FROM KB_PORT_YR_INFO ORDER BY PORT_YR DESC

SELECT P.* FROM ( SELECT PORT.PORT_SN AS port_sn ,PORT.PORT_YR AS port_yr ,PORT.BZENTY_NM AS bzenty_nm ,PORT.INTRO_CN AS intro_cn ,PORT.HMPG_LINK AS hmpg_link ,PORT.ATCH_FILE_SN AS atch_file_sn ,PORT.FRST_RGTR AS frst_rgtr ,TO_CHAR(PORT.FRST_REG_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS frst_reg_dt ,PORT.LAST_MDFR AS last_mdfr ,TO_CHAR(PORT.LAST_MDFCN_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS last_mdfcn_dt ,PORT.SORT_NO AS sort_no ,FILES.FILE_SN AS atch_file_sn ,FILES.ORGNL_FILE_NM AS ori_file_name ,FILES.FILE_NM AS file_name ,FILES.FILE_PATH AS file_path FROM KB_PORT_INFO PORT ,KB_FILE_INFO FILES WHERE PORT.ATCH_FILE_SN = FILES.FILE_SN(+) ORDER BY PORT.PORT_YR, PORT.SORT_NO, PORT.PORT_SN DESC ) P WHERE 1=1
AND P.PORT_YR = #{keyword}
